question: You have received a letter from your neighbour complaining about noise from your house/flat.Write a letter to your neighbour. In your letterexplain the cause of the noiseapologise for the noisedescribe what action you will take to solve the problemWrite at least 150 words.You do NOT need to write any addresses.Begin your letter as follows:Dear ……………….You should spend about 20 minutes on this task.
text: I am writing this letter to reply to your previous letter regarding the noise that I raised for you.

As my boyfriend and I will marry next year, currently we are decorating my house that is next to yours. The colour of the floor at my home is not suitable for the new decoration style, so a group of handymen have been working on the floor section since last week, which causes a lot of cluttering and dragging.

I am incredibly sorry for causing the noise for you. As you might have noticed that my lifestyle tends to be peaceful and quiet, and I rarely caused loud during the 10 years since we became neighbours. I hope you are able to accept my excuse and forgive me.

I know your daughter will attend the national examination next month, so she desperately needs a quiet environment to study. I promise you I will ask the handymen to work between 8am to 3pm on weekdays when your daughter is not at home.
Sorry again. I wish you can understand the reason why I bring some noise to you. If you would like to discuss this issue with me further, I would be extremely delighted to talk with you.
